notes.title: Funding
notes.p: This work was financially supported by the Biodiversity Survey and Assessment Project of the Ministry of Ecology and Environment of China (2019HJ2096001006), National Natural Science Foundation of China (31761143001 and 31870316), Minzu University of China (KLEM-ZZ201904, KLEM-ZZ201906, YLDXXK201819), and Jiansheng Fresh Herb Medicine R & D Foundation (JSYY-20190101-043).
